item.title: Superior Penthouse
item.dc:creator: travelhotel
item.content:encoded:
Superior Penthouse Room comprises of 1 Double Bed or 2 Twin Beds, 2 Bedside Tables, a Desk & Chair. The room is furnished with wall to wall carpeting, trendy furnishings and a balcony.
Our ultramodern glass bathroom is equipped with hairdryer, magnifying shaving and make up mirror as well as all the amenities you could possible need during your stay.
A Complimentary Bottle of Wine, Fresh Fruit and Mineral Water, are provided on arrival. Electric current: 220 Volts. Smoking rooms & inter-connecting rooms are also available.

item.title: Double Room With Town View
item.dc:creator: travelhotel
item.content:encoded:
Double Room comprises of 1 Double Bed or 2 Twin Beds, 2 Bedside Tables, a Desk & Chair. The room is furnished with wall to wall carpeting, trendy furnishings and a balcony.

Our ultramodern glass bathroom is equipped with hairdryer, magnifying shaving and make up mirror as well as all the amenities you could possible need during your stay.

A Complimentary Bottle of Wine, Fresh Fruit and Mineral Water, are provided on arrival. Electric current: 220 Volts. Smoking rooms & inter-connecting rooms are also available.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: We would highly recommend this flat. Excellent location, very spacious, well furnished and maintained, fitted to a high standard and managed by an accessible and responsive team.

wp:commentmeta.wp:meta_value: We would highly recommend this flat

item.title: Lake Tahoe House
item.dc:creator: travelhotel
item.content:encoded:
Standard Room comprises of 1 Double Bed or 2 Twin Beds, 2 Bedside Tables, a Desk & Chair. The room is furnished with wall to wall carpeting, trendy furnishings and a balcony.
Our ultramodern glass bathroom is equipped with hairdryer, magnifying shaving and make up mirror as well as all the amenities you could possible need during your stay.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I have stayed twice in this hotel and I always get a very positive experience. Great price, beautiful location and a very kind staff.

wp:commentmeta.wp:meta_value: Great price, beautiful location and a very kind staff.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: My parents and I recently stayed four nights at Faire’s apartment. It is a wonderful apartment, very modern, spacious and was very clean. Location is great, right in the Salamanca neighborhood, close to many bars and restaurants. Entrance process was very efficient and I didn’t not have any issues during the stay. Thanks for a great stay Faire!
I have stayed twice in this hotel and I always get a very positive experience. Great price, beautiful location and a very kind staff.

wp:commentmeta.wp:meta_value: Beautiful spot with a lovely view

item.title: Bebe House With Lake View
item.dc:creator: travelhotel
item.content:encoded:
Executive Room comprises of 1 Double Bed or 2 Twin Beds, 2 Bedside Tables, a Desk & Chair. The room is furnished with wall to wall carpeting, trendy furnishings and a balcony.
Our ultramodern glass bathroom is equipped with hairdryer, magnifying shaving and make up mirror as well as all the amenities you could possible need during your stay.
A Complimentary Bottle of Wine, Fresh Fruit and Mineral Water, are provided on arrival. Electric current: 220 Volts. Smoking rooms & inter-connecting rooms are also available.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Pretty incredible property, was definitely a bucket list stay for me. Only issue was there was construction next door so there were petty loud noises both mornings at 8:30 that made it hard to sleep. But the house is very pretty and unique, really loved the pool too. Hosts were friendly and helpful. Easy to recommend.
Ample, stylish, great location, great beds, elevator available. Air conditioning perfect for summers in Madrid. The janitor Nacho is nice and helpful. Totally recommend.

wp:commentmeta.wp:meta_value: Ample, stylish, great location, great beds, elevator available.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Faire is a phenomenal host, easy to communicate and responds immediately to messages. The apartment is magnificent, much better than what you see in the pictures! It is beautiful, comfortable, and functional, with high-end finishings, and located on a quiet street.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: A spacious apartment on first floor with 2 double bedrooms, 3 bathrooms and a vast amount of closet space. It was so good to have all that extra space on our 4 night stay compared with a hotel room.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Great location, extremely clean and brand new amenities. huge bedrooms, bathrooms and closets. Would recommend to anyone. Great value.

item.title: Room Sheraton Hotel
item.dc:creator: travelhotel
item.content:encoded:
Room Sheraton comprises of 1 Double Bed or 2 Twin Beds, 2 Bedside Tables, a Desk & Chair. The room is furnished with wall to wall carpeting, trendy furnishings and a balcony.
Our ultramodern glass bathroom is equipped with hairdryer, magnifying shaving and make up mirror as well as all the amenities you could possible need during your stay.
A Complimentary Bottle of Wine, Fresh Fruit and Mineral Water, are provided on arrival. Electric current: 220 Volts. Smoking rooms & inter-connecting rooms are also available.
